statements: SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT user_id, user_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, user_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT user_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT user_id, user_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE user_id = '1234-5678-9012';
SELECT user_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE user_id = 'abc123'
SELECT user_id, user_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE loyalty_points BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY loyalty_points ASC
SELECT user_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE user_name LIKE '%John%' OR user_name LIKE '%Doe%'
SELECT user_id, user_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE loyalty_points > 0 ORDER BY user_name ASC
SELECT * FROM frequent_shoppers;
SELECT shopper_name, total_points FROM frequent_shoppers WHERE total_points > 1000 ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 50 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM frequent_shoppers JOIN purchases ON frequent_shoppers.shopper_id = purchases.shopper_id;
SELECT shopper_name, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM frequent_shoppers JOIN purchases ON frequent_shoppers.shopper_id = purchases.shopper_id WHERE total_points > 500 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM frequent_shoppers WHERE shopper_id = 1 ORDER BY shopper_name ASC;
SELECT shopper_name, total_points FROM frequent_shoppers WHERE total_points > 100 ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT shopper_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_spent FROM purchases GROUP BY shopper_id HAVING total_spent > 500 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;

SELECT shopper_name, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM frequent_shoppers JOIN purchases ON frequent_shoppers.shopper_id = purchases.shopper_id WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT SUM(total_points) AS total_points_earned FROM frequent_shoppers WHERE shopper_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE total_spent > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, total_spent FROM customers WHERE total_spent < 500;
SELECT t.transaction_id, c.name, t.transaction_amount FROM transactions t JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE total_spent > 1000 ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE join_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING SUM(transaction_amount) > 500;
SELECT c.name, r.description FROM customers c JOIN rewards r ON c.customer_id = r.reward_id ORDER BY c.name;
SELECT AVG(point_value) AS avg_point_value FROM rewards;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT reward_description, points_required FROM rewards;

SELECT customer_name, reward_description, redemption_date FROM customers JOIN redeemed_rewards ON customers.customer_id = redeemed_rewards.customer_id JOIN rewards ON redeemed_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount > 50 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;

SELECT customer_name, reward_description, redemption_date FROM customers JOIN redeemed_rewards ON customers.customer_id = redeemed_rewards.customer_id JOIN rewards ON redeemed_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id WHERE points_required < 500 ORDER BY redemption_date DESC;

SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchases FROM customers LEFT JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_purchases > 1000 ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers JOIN redeemed_rewards ON customers.customer_id = redeemed_rewards.customer_id WHERE reward_id IN (SELECT reward_id FROM rewards WHERE points_required < 300) ORDER BY loyalty_points ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '12345';
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(points) AS total_points FROM rewards GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT offer_name, discount_percentage FROM offers WHERE discount_percentage >= 20 ORDER BY offer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT customer_id, points FROM rewards WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT offers.offer_name, purchases.purchase_amount, customers.name FROM offers INNER JOIN purchases ON offers.offer_id = purchases.purchase_id INNER JOIN customers ON purchases.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE offers.discount_percentage > 10;
